activities: Wix receives personal information from visitors that choose to provide such information on the Wix website and websites and/or applications hosted on the Wix service and/or mobile applications provided by Wix, such as by submitting their names and contact information at registration, and/or submitting their billing information for conducting transactions, and/or by choosing to disclose and/or post information to the website and/or application. In addition, Wix may collect certain information automatically from all visitors, including IP address, in order to provide and improve our services.
address: Wix.com Inc. 235 West 23rd Street, 8th floor, New York, NY

recoursemech:
The independent recourse mechanisms which are available to investigate unresolved complaints concerning Wix.com Inc compliance with the Safe Harbor Frameworks are:  
1. For consumer data - TRUSTe (see http://www.truste.com/)
